node_info.name: n8nTrigger
node_info.description: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance

properties.name: events
properties.description:
Specifies under which conditions an execution should happen:
  • Active Workflow Updated: Triggers when this workflow is updated
  • Instance Started: Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started
  • Workflow Activated: Triggers when this workflow is activated

options.name: Active Workflow Updated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is updated

options.name: Instance Started
options.description: Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started

options.name: Workflow Activated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is activated

possibleValues.name: Active Workflow Updated
possibleValues.description: Triggers when this workflow is updated

possibleValues.name: Instance Started
possibleValues.description: Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started

possibleValues.name: Workflow Activated
possibleValues.description: Triggers when this workflow is activated

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

settings.note: Trigger nodes only have common settings (notes, notesInFlow)
